name: Solace
description: Shipped by UC Berkeley team who placed first in the Virtuals Hackathon, Solace is an AI-driven emotional companion designed to provide continuous, context-aware mental health support through natural voice interaction and deep-learning–powered emotion analysis. Built to integrate seamlessly into users’ daily lives, Solace bridges the gap between on-demand self-care tools and professional therapy by delivering personalized interventions, tracking emotional wellbeing over time, and providing scalable support for individuals and teams.
